About This Property
Spacious, Charming and Bright 3 Bedroom 2nd floor unit in a convenient Brookline location close to both Coolidge Corner and the Longwood Medical areas. Only a 9 minute walk (0.4 mile) to either the Saint Paul Street T Station (Green Line C) or the Longwood T Station (Green Line D). 

Classic brick building with marbled foyer - Very large living room - Hardwood floors and tiled bathroom - Large pantry room in kitchen - Nice deck/porch outside of the kitchen area - Lots of closet space in addition to bedroom closets (foyer coat closet, two large hallway closets, and a linen closet) 

Heat/ Hot water included in rent

Laundry on site
No Broker FEE!
